trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Office 365 portal

trans-unit.source: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users where in the Office 365 portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source:
• Log on to the Office 365 portal.
  • At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog. This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.
trans-unit.target:
• Log on to the Office 365 portal.
  • At the top, click the icon that looks like a little cog. This will display a drop-down that says Office 365 settings.

trans-unit.source:
• Click on the Office 365, settings. This will open the settings page.
  • On the left, click additional security verification.
trans-unit.target:
• Click on the Office 365, settings. This will open the settings page.
  • On the left, click additional security verification.

trans-unit.source:
• On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security. This will redirect you to a new page. You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app
  • Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
trans-unit.target:
• On the right, click the link that says Update my phone numbers used for account security. This will redirect you to a new page. You will have to verify how you are again using either your phone or the mobile app
  • Once this completes you should be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
